abstract: The Italian government, fresh from having dissuaded AT&T from investing about 2 billion euros to buy a 6 percent stake in Telecom Italia, made a call on Tuesday for Italian companies to band together to buy the troubled telecommunications company from the controlling shareholder, Pirelli.

headline.main: Prodi Calls for Italian Bid for Telecom Italia
